steps.headline: Want to be known as a god, during offline play?
steps.description: Try this cheat, which makes you become invincible. During a match, Press Start, hold L2 and R2, then enter the following combination: Up Up Up Left Down Down Down Left Up Up Up Left Right. This cheat will last until you turn off your system. Cheat doesn't not work during online play.

steps.headline: Running out of Ammo?
steps.description: No problem. Enter this cheat for regenerating ammo. This cheat is helpful if you want to use more than the stock grenades, rocket launchers, ect. Press Start, hold L2 and R2, then enter the following combination: Up Down Left Down Down Left Down Down Left Down Down Down Left Right. Cheat does not work during online play. Cheat will last until you turn the system off or if you do the cheat again. You may find you will need this if you have the invincibility cheat on!

text:
Steps Take control of your favorite faction in the "Galactic Conquest" menu, or load a previous struggle for domination.  Stock up on bonuses for any battle situation (see TIPS for highly recommended bonuses).  Move your fleet to the nearest enemy planet.  Prepare to attack!  Ground Combat Before the battle, activate your choice of bonuses to benefit your army during the fight.  Use whichever unit will benefit your side the most.  Explore the terrain map and memorize your objectives (i.e. capturing enemy command posts) while blasting your way through enemy reinforcements. Dominate the field by using a one-man strategy to force the enemy's reinforcement count to drop to zero or capture all enemy command posts and hold them for twenty seconds.  Space Combat Hop in a bomber and go to the enemy frigates. Destroying them will usually give you the Guardian and War Hero awards, giving you extra protection/damage. Go to the enemy capital ship. If you don't have the War Hero award yet, then  try to kill a few fighters on the way. Bomb the critical systems. The recommended order to take them out is:
Shields, of course. Just fly along the ship's length, so that all of your bombs are sure to hit. Unload all six at the same time. Engines
Bridge
Communications
Sensors
Life Support Stuck? Try Cheating Want to be known as a god, during offline play? Try this cheat, which makes you become invincible. During a match, Press Start, hold L2 and R2, then enter the following combination: Up Up Up Left Down Down Down Left Up Up Up Left Right. This cheat will last until you turn off your system. Cheat doesn't not work during online play. Running out of Ammo? No problem. Enter this cheat for regenerating ammo. This cheat is helpful if you want to use more than the stock grenades, rocket launchers, ect. Press Start, hold L2 and R2, then enter the following combination: Up Down Left Down Down Left Down Down Left Down Down Down Left Right. Cheat does not work during online play. Cheat will last until you turn the system off or if you do the cheat again. You may find you will need this if you have the invincibility cheat on!
